column1: Configure your payment option as defined on your Oney 3x4x contract. You can find the value directly from your Oney interface.
column2: Configure your payment option as defined on your Oney 3x4x contract. You can find the value directly from your Oney interface.

column1: CreateHostedCheckoutApi request has failed. Please contact the provider.
column2: CreateHostedCheckoutApi request has failed. Please contact the provider.

column1: Enabling this option will make sure the customer performs a “Strong Customer Authentication” and hence enforces a “challenge” 3DS flow.
column2: Enabling this option will make sure the customer performs a “Strong Customer Authentication” and hence enforces a “challenge” 3DS flow.

column1: GetHostedCheckoutApi request has failed. Please contact the provider.
column2: GetHostedCheckoutApi request has failed. Please contact the provider.

column1: Group credit and debit cards under one single button on the checkout page
column2: Group credit and debit cards under one single button on the checkout page

column1: If the setting is enabled and the sum of the order is below 30 euros, the customer won’t be asked to go through 3DS auth.
column2: If the setting is enabled and the sum of the order is below 30 euros, the customer won’t be asked to go through 3DS auth.

column1: Please go to an ATM to validate the Multibanco payment.
column2: Please go to an ATM to validate the Multibanco payment.

column1: Should be set only if you use PWA Studio or any other 3rd party frontend.
column2: Should be set only if you use PWA Studio or any other 3rd party frontend.

column1: Submit Customer Cart Items Data to Worldline
column2: Submit Customer Cart Items Data to Worldline

column1: The payment has failed, please, try again
column2: The payment has failed, please, try again

column1: The payment has rejected, please, try again
column2: The payment has rejected, please, try again

column1: This option should not be turned off if the merchant is based in a EU country
column2: This option should not be turned off if the merchant is based in a EU country

column1: Trigger an Authentication for Every Payment
column2: Trigger an Authentication for Every Payment

column1: Set the number of times a customer can attempt a declined payment on the hosted checkout page. After reaching this retry limit, the transaction will be considered as definitely declined and customer will be redirected back to your store.
column2: Set the number of times a customer can attempt a declined payment on the hosted checkout page. After reaching this retry limit, the transaction will be considered as definitely declined and customer will be redirected back to your store.

column1: Enter a value from 1-10. Default value is 10.
column2: Enter a value from 1-10. Default value is 10.

column1: Enter a value from 1-1440. Default value is 180.
column2: Enter a value from 1-1440. Default value is 180.

column1: Set in minutes how long the hosted payment page session should last for. Customers attempting to process their payment past this time limit will not be allowed to complete their transaction. Allowed value ranges from 1 minute to 1440 minutes (24 hours). By default, the hosted payment page has a session timeout of 180 minutes. Leave this box empty to use the default session timeout.
column2: Set in minutes how long the hosted payment page session should last for. Customers attempting to process their payment past this time limit will not be allowed to complete their transaction. Allowed value ranges from 1 minute to 1440 minutes (24 hours). By default, the hosted payment page has a session timeout of 180 minutes. Leave this box empty to use the default session timeout.

column1: Select which modes of bank transfer you want to allow.'Instant Payments Only' : Receive transfer confirmation within 20 minutes. Limits customer bank choices to only those supporting instant payments.'Standard & Instant Payments' : Accept transfers from all banks. Broader customer bank choice but it can take up to 96 hours for transfer confirmation.
column2: Select which modes of bank transfer you want to allow.'Instant Payments Only' : Receive transfer confirmation within 20 minutes. Limits customer bank choices to only those supporting instant payments.'Standard & Instant Payments' : Accept transfers from all banks. Broader customer bank choice but it can take up to 96 hours for transfer confirmation.

column1: Minimum 2, maximum 15 characters. You can specify a fixed value that will be sent to the banks handling the payment. If the consumer's bank is supporting that, this value can be displayed on the consumer's bank slip. Important note : setting a value here is mandatory in order to use Pledg payment method.
column2: Minimum 2, maximum 15 characters. You can specify a fixed value that will be sent to the banks handling the payment. If the consumer's bank is supporting that, this value can be displayed on the consumer's bank slip. Important note : setting a value here is mandatory in order to use Pledg payment method.
